title: Brands Hatch: F1's beloved countryside amphitheatre
summary: On this day in 1964, the roar of F1 engines echoed through the Kent countryside for the first time, as Brands Hatch made its debut on the world stage

qa_pairs.question: In what year did Brands Hatch make its Formula 1 debut?
In which county is Brands Hatch located?
What type of event was held at Brands Hatch when it debuted in 1964?
